name: Gravitational Real Estate
description:
Game made for my second year assignment

Play as amateur astronaut Avery as they try to find a new planet to live on after a bad day on space twitter.

Controls

Keyboard and mouse:

  • A & D to move
  • Space to jump
  • Left click in a direction to boost
  • E to interact

Controller:

  • Left Stick to move
  • A to jump
  • X to interact
  • Right stick to aim
  • Right trigger to boost

*Optimised on an XBOX One controller
